text: Naoko Sakurai (born 9 December 1953) is a Japanese equestrian. She competed in the individual dressage event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Japan Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in equestrian Category:Equestrians at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1986 Asian Games
title: Naoko Sakurai
